summary: Vim and Microsoft Visual Studio .NET integration
name: visual_studio.vim
description:
NEW IN VERSION 1.2

* Switch between multiple instance of Visual Studio
* Build projects and access project file heirarchy directly from Vim
* Support for Visual Studio 2003, 2005 and 2008

Thanks to Henrik Ã–hman for contributions to this version.

See the visual_studio.vim help page for more information:
  http://www.plan10.com/vim/visual-studio/doc/1.2
install_details:
Requirements

* Vim 7.0 or above
* Python 2.4.  Please install the version of python that vim was built with. For vim 7.0 this is python 2.4.
  http://www.python.org/download/releases/2.4.4
* Python for Windows extensions.  Please install the version specific the the Python release.
  http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=78018

Installation instructions

* Download the file visual_studio.zip. This contains the files visual_studio.vim and visual_studio.py.
* Unpack the files into your plugin directory, for example: $VIM\vimfiles\plugin.

versions.release_notes: Support for more VS versions, multiple VS solutions, VS projects and VS project files.
Support for building, compiling, viewing output window and other enhancements.
